name: To Be A King Bundle
description:
Purchase the bundle and receive:
  • To Be A King: Volume 1
  • To Be A King Volume 1 - Official Guide

To Be A King: Volume 1

This is Volume 1 of our story, and includes the first seven chapters of To Be A King. There are more volumes currently in development. They will be released on GOG as DLC as they are completed.

  • Chapters 1 through 7
  • Over 5800 renders
  • 36 lewd scenes
  • Scene replay gallery for all sex scenes
  • 10 current love interests (more to come in Volume 2)
  • Pursue a harem or just a single love interest
  • Codex with biographies of the characters you meet, as well as a way to track your love interest choices.
  • Multiple paths that change the story
  • Thousands of lines of dialogue
  • Several hours of play time
  • Numerous choices to make multiple playthroughs interesting
  • Political intrigue
  • More drama than a daytime soap opera

Official Game Guide

This official guide will help you get the most out of your playing time in To Be A King. You will see what you need to do in order to unlock scenes and not miss out on all the content in the game. Over 150 pages of information on Volume 1 of To Be A King is here.

  • A walkthrough covering how to unlock all the scenes in the scene gallery
  • Detailed information on all the love interests and many other characters in the game
  • Exclusive renders not seen before in full high resolution
  • Playing advice from the developer himself
  • Get a detailed explanation of the different points systems in the game
  • Find out how to unlock every love interest


This Bundle may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
